cyclone.name: DORIAN
cyclone.current_location: about 30 miles south of Cape Fear, North Carolina
cyclone.trajectory: moving northeast along the U.S. East Coast toward southeastern New England and Nova Scotia
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: near or along the coast of North Carolina (Cape Fear‐Cape Lookout area)

weather_observation.watch_coast: Hurricane and storm-surge watches confined to South & North Carolina, Mid-Atlantic, and parts of New England coasts
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane warnings from South Santee River SC to NC/VA border; Tropical-storm warnings northward to Massachusetts islands
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Atlantic coast from northeastern Florida northward through the Carolinas and into the Mid-Atlantic and New England
weather_observation.wind: Only brief, non-tropical-storm-force gusts possible from distant outer rainbands; sustained gales not expected
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected on the Gulf coast where Port Manatee is located
weather_observation.rainfall: Isolated showers from fringe outer bands; totals generally <1 inch
weather_observation.other_hazards: Atlantic-side rip currents may persist, but no direct operational hazard expected at the port’s Gulf location
